page.title: 07CYCLES IN BASSINGBOURN
page.content: We have been finding out how many people in the village have bikes, BMX's or both. This Venn Diagram shows our results.{ {........A A shows bike owners. { . 131 . } B shows BMX owners. {. }........ {The intersection shows {. }.21. . {people who have both. {........ }.B . 54 . ........ Cycles are popular in this area because activities are near by, the ground is flat and it is not worth getting a car out for short trips. Out of 203 people in our junior school, 15 of them have no bike or BMX. 205 of their parents had a bike out of a possible total of 406. A BMX is a light weight scrambling bike which can cost Â£100-Â£1000. There is a BMX club in Royston.
